title: Real Estate Project
desc: A role-based MERN application for property buying and selling. Users can browse and purchase properties, agents can list new ones, and admins can manage users, agents, and listings. Features CRUD operations and secure access with Firebase tokens.
features: Make Offers with Stripe Payment Integration
Dashboard with Role-Based Analytics (Admin, Agent, User)
RESTful API Integration using Express and Node.js
MongoDB Database for storing users, properties, reviews, etc.
Reusable Components built with React and JSX
Real-Time Form Validation and User Feedback
Modern NPM Packages (Axios, React Icons, etc.)
Admin dashboard to manage users and agents
additionalFeatures: Admin Panel: Manage Users, Roles & Reports
Interactive UI/UX with Lottie & AOS Animations

title: Event Management Application
desc: This is a simple react based fully crud app using REST api to create, update and delete functionality. SODEV is a community-driven platform where users can create, join, and track social development events in their local area.
additionalFeatures: Technologies & Packages Used: React, React Router, Tailwind CSS, react-helmet, Firebase, Axios, React Datepicker, React Toastify & SweetAlert2, React Icons, JWT (via backend)

title: Recipe Booking Platform
desc: Cook_verse is a recipe-sharing web application for food enthusiasts, allowing users to explore, save, and share their favorite recipes. The platform includes user authentication, personalized collections, and seamless browsing to enhance the culinary experience.
features: User authentication and profile management (Firebase Email & Google Sign-In)
additionalFeatures: Dark mode toggle for light/dark theme
Filter recipes by category and like count
Private and protected routes (JWT / Firebase authentication)
Users can manage, update, and delete their own recipes

title: Engineers Home
desc: 'Engineers Home Consultancy' A simple, responsive landing page built with React and Tailwind CSS for an engineering consultancy. Showcases their services, projects, and portfolio, providing an elegant online presence for civil engineering clients.

title: RSWA
desc: RSWA is a web platform for a social organization that manages blood group and member information. Users can add their blood group data, while admins can manage, search, filter, and sort the data. The platform features role-based authentication, tabular data display, and smooth navigation. It was developed to support a significant humanitarian cause.
features: User registration and login with role-based authentication
Add and manage blood group data
Admin panel to manage users and data
additionalFeatures: Clean and modern UI/UX using Tailwind CSS and Ant Design

title: Hello She
desc: Hello She is a non-profit organization dedicated to raising awareness about cyber security among women and female students. This is a landing page without functionality.
